findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract declares state variables that their value is initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards, which can be optimized by declaring them as immutable to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not conform to the Solidity naming conventions for function and variable names, which can affect code readability and maintainability.
